text: Engelbert Jarek (7 June 1935 - 23 August 2017) was a Polish footballer. He was born in Rokittnitz, Hindenburg O.S., German Empire . Jarek competed in the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was known for managing and playing for Odra Opole. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Polish footballers
title: Engelbert Jarek
